description: We have FLAGS.stub_network to ignore some code paths in tests.  This mixing should be removed in favor of stubs in the tests themselves.
title: Remove stub_network flag and replace usage with stubbing out of relevant calls in tests

Author: Rongze Zhu <email address hidden>

    Remove stub_network flag
    
    Fixes bug #816025
    
    remove stub_network flag and replace usage with stubbing out of relevant
    calls in tests.
    In nova/tests/fake_network.py , I add set_stub_network_methods and
    unset_stub_network_methods. They can be userd for tests.
